info.name: Kis-Snowflakes Trippy2 247c
info.description:
Thanks Fabrice !
Variants : https://www.shadertoy.com/view/tlsSDs
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/WlsSDl
https://www.shadertoy.com/view/3lsSDl

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(z,u)                              \
    vec2 A=u-u,B=A,C=z.xw, G, b = u/iResolution.y/7.;     \
    B.x = 1.7;                               \
    float a, k=.0,i=k; \
    for(; i++ < 11. ; C = (b-G)/3., k *= 3. )  \
        a = dot( normalize(G = b-A-B), normalize(B+B-A) ), \
        A = a < -.5 ? A : (k++,B + C),    \
        B = a >  .5 ? k++, B : C;        \
    z = cos( iTime + vec4(11,9,7,1)*k ) / sin(iTime-a*.6+k)
renderpass.name: Image
